msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" />Huh! I think we have the same .<20_2 arg="9" />Wait a sec Is it customized? Whoa! I think so!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Looks like a Custom Designs job. That's awesome, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Actually, I've got at my place too.<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />My designs are kinda different though. I love the personality on yours, !
<20_2 arg="10" />Your <20_2 arg="9" /> That style's like mine!<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />Well, the STYLE's the same. It's probably slightly different. You know how it is with handmade stuff.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I knew it seemed familiar! I've got at home too.The Custom Designs work on yours kinda threw me off for sec. It looks great! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Extremely you, !
<20_2 arg="10" />Oh nice!<20_2 arg="9" /> I've got this exact same . I love mine. <20_3 arg="6" />They say great minds think alike, right, ?<20_3 arg="3" /> We have awesome taste!
